name: Waialae no Kiseki: Extra 36 Holes

As this golf game delivers physical and sporting gameplay, you can show your expert moves and develop your skills to win the match. Waialae no Kiseki: Extra 36 Holes is a fun accessory to your video game system, so you can enjoy it again and again as a favorite item in your collection.
